mapper.select: SELECT T_IDOSS_PENANGANAN_GANGGUAN_ID, NIK_PELAPOR, NAMA_PELAPOR, BAGIAN_PELAPOR, JUDUL, DESKRIPSI, DAMPAK, P_IDOSS_TYPE_ID, NIK_PELAKSANA, NAMA_PELAKSANA, P_IDOSS_ROOT_CAUSED_ID, STATUS, SOLUSI, MTTR, DURASI, NO_HP, EXT, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_USER, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_USER FROM SNI.T_IDOSS_PENANGANAN_GANGGUAN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNI.T_IDOSS_PENANGANAN_GANGGUAN ( T_IDOSS_PENANGANAN_GANGGUAN_ID, NIK_PELAPOR, NAMA_PELAPOR, BAGIAN_PELAPOR, JUDUL, DESKRIPSI, DAMPAK, P_IDOSS_TYPE_ID, NIK_PELAKSANA, NAMA_PELAKSANA, P_IDOSS_ROOT_CAUSED_ID, STATUS, SOLUSI, MTTR, DURASI, NO_HP, EXT, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_USER, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_USER, GEN_ID_COL, INSERTED_ROOT_CAUSED ) VALUES( #{t_idoss_penanganan_gangguan_id}, #{nik_pelapor, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nama_pelapor, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bagian_pelapor, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{judul, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deskripsi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dampak, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_idoss_type_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nik_pelaksana, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nama_pelaksana, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_idoss_root_caused_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solusi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mttr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{no_hp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created_date}, #{created_user}, #{updated_date}, #{updated_user}, #{gen_id_col}, #{inserted_root_caused,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SNI.T_IDOSS_PENANGANAN_GANGGUAN SET NIK_PELAPOR=#{nik_pelapor, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMA_PELAPOR=#{nama_pelapor, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAGIAN_PELAPOR=#{bagian_pelapor, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JUDUL=#{judul, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESKRIPSI=#{deskripsi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAMPAK=#{dampak, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_IDOSS_TYPE_ID=#{p_idoss_type_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, NIK_PELAKSANA=#{nik_pelaksana, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMA_PELAKSANA=#{nama_pelaksana, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_IDOSS_ROOT_CAUSED_ID=#{p_idoss_root_caused_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS=#{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOLUSI=#{solusi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MTTR=#{mttr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DURASI=#{durasi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NO_HP=#{no_hp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT=#{ext, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE=#{created_date}, CREATED_USER=#{created_user}, UPDATED_DATE=#{updated_date}, UPDATED_USER=#{updated_user}, INSERTED_ROOT_CAUSED=#{inserted_root_caused} WHERE T_IDOSS_PENANGANAN_GANGGUAN_ID=#{t_idoss_penanganan_gangguan_id}
